statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT platform, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM marketing_campaigns GROUP BY platform;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' AND conversions > 100 ORDER BY total_budget DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT platform, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM marketing_campaigns GROUP BY platform;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, conversions FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < '2022-09-30' ORDER BY conversions DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, platform, total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE clicks > 100 OR conversions > 5 ORDER BY total_budget ASC, clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM historical_campaign_data ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, conversions FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, marketing_channel FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, marketing_channel, budget FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE budget >= 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, marketing_channel FROM historical_campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND marketing_channel = 'Social Media';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, campaign_budget, start_date, end_date FROM future_campaign_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 5;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, campaign_budget, start_date, end_date FROM future_campaign_strategies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, total_clicks FROM Campaign_Performance;
SELECT * FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign_Performance ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, platform FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE channel = 'Social Media';
SELECT click_id, user_id, timestamp FROM Clicks_Conversions WHERE click_value >= 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaign_Performance WHERE total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC, campaign_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaign_Performance WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND total_clicks >= 100 ORDER BY end_date DESC, total_clicks ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, platform, channel FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget >= 10000 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC LIMIT 20;

SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM Campaign_Performance WHERE total_clicks > total_conversions AND total_conversions > 0 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC, end_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT campaign_name, total_spent, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM Campaign_Performance JOIN Clicks_Conversions ON Campaign_Performance.campaign_id = Clicks_Conversions.campaign_id WHERE Clicks_Conversions.click_value >= 10 AND Clicks_Conversions.conversion_status = TRUE ORDER BY total_conversions DESC, total_spent ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM audience_segment WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT channel_name, total_impressions FROM channel_performance WHERE total_impressions > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, total_budget, total_conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY start_date DESC, total_budget ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, total_clicks, total_conversions FROM campaign_performance WHERE total_impressions > 1000;
SELECT cp.campaign_id, cp.total_budget, ap.segment_name FROM campaign_performance cp JOIN audience_segment ap ON cp.campaign_id = ap.segment_id;
SELECT cf.*, cp.total_clicks FROM campaign_feedback cf LEFT JOIN campaign_performance cp ON cf.campaign_id = cp.campaign_id;

SELECT ap.channel_name, cp.start_date, SUM(cp.total_budget) AS total_budget_spent FROM campaign_performance cp JOIN channel_performance ap ON cp.campaign_id = ap.channel_id GROUP BY ap.channel_name, cp.start_date ORDER BY total_budget_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM MarketingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_id, budget, impressions, clicks FROM MarketingCampaignPerformance ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM MarketingCampaignPerformance WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT segment_name, description FROM AudienceSegmentation;
SELECT * FROM MarketingCampaignPerformance;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM MarketingCampaignPerformance WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT segment_name FROM AudienceSegmentation ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, competitor_name, strength_score, weakness_score FROM CompetitorAnalysis WHERE strength_score > weakness_score;
SELECT campaign_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM CampaignFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
